column4: anyone tell me how i can get a program in wine to recognize a usb com port

i looked everywhere and i have been looking for 3 days i could really use some help with this
it prolly won't work, since the software prolly needs direct access to the ports
there is no way to direct it there
no
they make a linux version of the software tmiliar on how to install ithat is a .rpm but i am not fa
sorry bad typing
google on how to use alien to convert that .rpm to a .deb
ok thanks for your help
no problem dude
i have alien installed can u tell me where to find it to get it going.
should just be able to type alien in a terminal
thanks
sorry to bother you but i have 1 more ?. i converted it to .deb so then how do i install it
dpkg -i foo.deb
ok thanks

it'll prolly be in the same directory where you ran the command
